name: Legends of Time
description: Legends of Time is a multiplayer couch hack and slash where you cooperatively work with friends to take on a world of enemies.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 3 GHz Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 660 Ti DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
